name: @creacore/event-ts
description: Simple, standalone and easy event library in typescript

scripts.build: npm run build-node && npm run build-browser
scripts.build-examples: tsc && echo 'library built' && tsc --p ./examples &&  echo 'examples built'
scripts.build-tests: tsc && echo 'library built' && tsc --p ./tests &&  echo 'tests built'

author: Creacore
